headline: Northern Trust (NTRS): Is the Recent Rally Justified by the Bank’s Current Valuation?
summary: Recent performance and why Northern Trust is on investors radar Northern Trust (NTRS) has quietly staged a strong run, with the stock up about 41% over the past year and roughly 34% year to date, drawing fresh attention from long term investors. See our latest analysis for Northern Trust. The recent 10.9% 1 month share price return, on top of a robust 41.4% 1 year total shareholder return, suggests momentum is building as investors warm to Northern Trust's earnings resilience and balance...
